snippet: “The Life of Jesus Christ,” a three-and-a-half-hour play with a cast of 70, made its debut this weekend in a three-day run at the Louisiana State Penitentiary.
abstract: The Life of Jesus Christ, a three-and-a-half-hour play with a cast of 70 inmates, debuts in a three-day run at the Louisiana State Penitentiary in Angola; fully staged and costumed production features men from the prison and women from a neighboring correctional facility; Angola has 5,329 inmates, with over 4,000 serving life without parole .
lead_paragraph: “The Life of Jesus Christ,” a three-and-a-half-hour play with a cast of 70, made its debut this weekend in a three-day run at the Louisiana State Penitentiary.

headline.main: In Prison, Play With Trial at Its Heart Resonates
